channel.title: Internet Urban Legends
channel.description: Loey Lane and Snitchery bring you the freakiest stories from across the web, spinning each episode with the clues, conspiracies, and conundrums that make internet urban legends so mesmerizing. From creepypastas to frightful TikToks, the Gruesome Twosome go extremely online to separate hoax from haunt… Will they find answers, or more reasons to stay awake all night? Find out every week on this Spotify Original from Parcast!

item.title: Acali Raft Experiment
item.description: Tales of the so-called Sex Raft are floating around the internet, so Loey and Eleanor are taking the bait… This open sea experiment was a hot mess that was supposed to promote world peace?? Let’s dive in.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Bridgewater Triangle
item.description: Bigfoot! Thunderbirds! Poltergeists! Pukwudgies? A 200-sq. mile vortex in Massachusetts has seen some of the wildest cryptids and UFOs... if you believe the stories. Loey and Eleanor enter the Bridgewater Triangle to investigate why it’s such a hotspot for paranormal activity.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Season 2 Trailer!
item.description: All new creepy stories, same spine-chilling effect. Loey and Eleanor introduce the second season of Internet Urban Legends, premiering April 12th. Listen for a sneak peek, then hear new episodes every Tuesday — free and only on Spotify!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Making a Creepypasta w/ Barry & Jason
item.description: Today’s a VERY special episode with two incredible guests. Loey and Eleanor create their very own creepypasta with the help of incredible game inventors Barry McLaughlin and Jason Lautenschleger. The clock is ticking… the creep factor is TURNED UP… and the keys to creating a masterful creepypasta are fully unlocked. Let’s get into it!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Hat Man
item.description: As far as cryptids go, Hat Man sounds… not so bad, right? WRONG. He’s in your nightmares. Down your hallway. On the side of the road at midnight. Hat Man is a shadow person whose M.O. is less hat tricks, more downright terror. Loey and Eleanor track him through the internet and pop culture.   Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Mysteries of Camp Hero
item.description: Secret experiments. Government conspiracies. And so much trespassing. Loey and Eleanor head into the tunnels of Montauk, New York’s Camp Hero — the former military base that partly inspired Stranger Things — and tap into new stories being shared online about what really went on there.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Mystery of Moll Dyer
item.description: From 17th-century Maryland all the way to TikTok today. Loey and Eleanor investigate the legend of Moll Dyer and why a rock, of all things, is securing her witchy legacy.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Hookman
item.description: He’s got a hook for a hand and a murderous itch to scratch… Loey and Eleanor chat about the legend of the Hookman, bogeyman of Lover’s Lanes everywhere. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Eerie Illuminati
item.description: Let the initiation BEGIN. Loey and Eleanor dive into the lore surrounding the infamous, elusive Illuminati… and how it went from a real Bavarian club to the internet’s favorite conspiracy theory.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Lake Shawnee Amusement Park
item.description: Loey and Eleanor head to West Virginia to explore an amusement park that’s been abandoned not just once, but twice, and is allegedly haunted by a little girl — who was just one of *several* people who died there. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Kenny Veach and the M Cave
item.description: A seasoned hiker finds something strange in the Nevada desert, then later disappears. Now all we have are YouTube comments and conspiracies about what happened to him. Loey and Eleanor discuss the mysterious case of Kenny Veach, and what was really going on with the M Cave.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Abandoned Disney
item.description: What could be creepier than the sight of an overgrown, derelict amusement park? Maybe the reasons it was abandoned in the first place… Loey and Eleanor discuss two abandoned Disney parks with haunting histories and one *terrifying* amoeba.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Candle Cove w/ Creepypasta Author Kris Straub
item.description: A creepy kids show aired decades ago, but only a few people remember it… and the details are hazy. Everyone’s left wondering if it was ever real. And then the Candle Cove creepypasta comes to life. Loey and Eleanor are *very excited* to welcome Kris Straub, the very creator of the Candle Cove creepypasta and Local 58 web series, to discuss horror and the art of making heart-pounding media! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Grim Goatman
item.description: TikTok loves a cryptid, and so do we! This one’s a seven foot tall human-goat hybrid who carries an ax and lives under bridges (same, Goatman, same). Loey and Eleanor walk us through the confirmed sightings and two potential origin stories — one involving mad science, the other connected to a historical incident. Bonus: Loey shares a story about a time she witnessed a cryptid herself. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Robert the Doll
item.description: He’s life-sized, made of straw, dressed like a sailor, and haunted to the core. Loey and Eleanor share the story of Florida’s Robert the Doll, who’s been setting people on edge since the 1900s. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Gruesome Gaming: Sports Curses
item.description: Is an arcade game haunted by the tragic death of a basketball player? Could being on the cover of a video game curse you forever? Loey and Eleanor discuss the super spooky NBA Jam haunting and the Madden Curse, from the stats and player setbacks to the real-life scares.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Charlie No Face
item.description: Is it still an urban legend if it’s true? Loey and Eleanor discuss a real man whose origin story wasn’t good enough for the internet, so the internet came up with terrifying new ones. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Creepy Christmas
item.description: Santa’s not the only one watching… Loey and Eleanor regale us with the tales of two Christmas spirits who traded “merry” for “scary” and are creeping the HECK out of kids (and adults…) even today.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Time Traveler
item.description: A computer virus. A second civil war. A new capital in… Nebraska? Loey and Eleanor head back to the 2000s to investigate the warnings of a self-described time traveler from the year 2036. Who was John Titor? And what was really going on with all his strange messages??  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Marilyn Monroe: Murder, Curses & Aliens
item.description: Actress, singer, icon… Murder victim?? Loey and Eleanor explore every angle of the conspiracies spreading on TikTok about Marilyn Monroe’s untimely death — from her involvement with a famous family that may have gotten her killed, to why her death is linked to Area 51. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Most Mysterious Song
item.description: When a song goes viral in the mid-2000s, it sparks thrilling questions about who’s singing it, what it’s called, and why no one’s stepped up to claim it as theirs. Loey and Eleanor sound off some theories on the origin of the internet’s most mysterious bop.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Fresno Nightcrawler
item.description: It looks a bit like two insect legs walking like human legs. There are no arms, torso, or head. It's called the Fresno Nightcrawler, and there’s plenty of proof to suggest it's real. Loey and Eleanor analyze the video evidence to tell us if we need to be worried. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Heaven's Gate Horror
item.description: This is one game of “follow the leader” you never want to play… Loey and Eleanor go beyond the headlines of the Heaven’s Gate tragedy, looking at the lesser-known parts of the cult that is *still* harnessing the internet to spread its celestial beliefs.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Mysterious Malaysia Airlines Flight 370
item.description: You might remember the headlines, but the case of the missing Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 is so much sadder… and a LOT stranger… than anyone would guess. Loey and Eleanor dig into the details and online conspiracy theories surrounding one of the biggest aviation mysteries in history.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Facebook Fiasco
item.description: It’s corporate conspiracy time! Loey and Eleanor discuss last month’s *interestingly timed* Facebook outage. Was it a PR move to distract from the whistleblower news? Internal sabotage? Or something darker… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Scary Movies w/ Sarah Turney (LIVE from Spotify Greenroom!)
item.description: It’s a crossover event! Loey and Eleanor went live with Sarah Turney, host of the true crime podcast Disappearances, for a special episode on Spotify Greenroom. First up, the trio discusses The Blair Witch Project’s deleted scenes and conspiracy theories. Then it’s The Mothman Prophecies and a round of “movie vs. legend.” And finally… Candyman. Along the way, they take audience questions, and a listener takes the mic to share some spooky trivia.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Exorcist Curse
item.description: Okay, you might know The Exorcist for that famous scene featuring a 360 degree head spin. But did you also know that the film itself is cursed? Like, serial killer on set, multiple random fatalities, inferno-bird cursed. Loey and Eleanor take to TikTok to find out everything there is to know about the most haunted movie ever made. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Jeff the Killer
item.description: He’s one of the OG internet urban legends. Loey and Eleanor follow the plot of Jeff the Killer, a teenage serial killer with a twisted backstory. From creepypasta to paranormal game to viral heartthrob, this is one legend that just won’t go to sleep…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Las Vegas Haunts
item.description: Welcome to Sin City! Loey and Eleanor take a tour through Las Vegas, stopping at an iconic landmark that *might* be home to a vampire, and two hotels rumored to be haunted. These stories are just too good to stay in Vegas.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Horror Tok: Megan Is Missing
item.description: Don’t watch it at night. Don’t watch it alone. And maybe… don’t watch it at all? Loey and Eleanor discuss the 2011 horror movie ‘Megan Is Missing’ and the paranormal resurgence it’s having on TikTok. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Queen Mary
item.description: A place of history AND a paranormal hotspot? Get you a ship that can do both. Loey and Eleanor dive into all things Queen Mary, from its dark history to its alleged hauntings to the reason it’s going viral again.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Cecil Hotel w/ Special Guest Peet Montzingo
item.description: Loey and Eleanor scream through the chilling history of Los Angeles’s infamous Cecil Hotel before welcoming their first-ever guest, Peet Montzingo! Peet is a musician and TikToker who lives next to the Cecil. He shares stories, sightings, and eerie coincidences that’ll make your stomach drop (but don’t worry — there’s plenty of laughs, too). Check in and stow your bags in the lobby, your wicked tour awaits! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Nightmare on Sleep App
item.description: Feeling sleepy? Well get ready to be jolted wide awake! In 2014, a bizarre story took off on Reddit involving a single mom and a spine-chilling voice recorded on her sleep app. Loey and Eleanor stay up all night to trade theories and put this story to bed.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Gruesome Gaming: Polybius
item.description: An ‘80s arcade game is rumored to have been a government mind control experiment… Loey and Eleanor power up their investigation, pinballing from mysterious sightings of men in black, to a game developer’s eerie exit, to how Portland, Oregon became an unusual epicenter. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Creepy Ring Cameras
item.description: It’s always watching… Loey and Eleanor set their sights on the at-home security system that’s supposed to bring peace of mind, but might actually send you screaming down your driveway. They’re talking creepy captured footage, hacked speakers, and yes — even clowns.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Talking Angela
item.description: Did hackers take over an AI-powered chatbot for kids? Talking Angela has millions of users… and some very sinister rumors surrounding it. Loey and Eleanor log on to chat features, bugs and police investigations centered on the talking app that might be saying too much…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Gruesome Gaming: Hidden Secrets
item.description: From Spongebob to Call of Duty, just about every genre of video game has creepy things lurking beyond its boundaries. But are they glitches, cheats, Easter eggs… or something else entirely? Loey and Eleanor team up to take on the most unsettling discoveries in virtual worlds.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Disney's Missing Buzzy
item.description: Loey and Eleanor take a wild tour through the theories, rumors, and criminal activity surrounding the disappearance of an iconic animatronic from Disney’s EPCOT Center. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Reddit Murders: Jason In Hell
item.description: When a Redditor posted online asking for marriage advice in 2016, he had no idea he was setting up the context of a terrible family tragedy. Loey and Eleanor discuss the real-life horror story that was documented in real-time on a subreddit…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Gruesome Gaming: Evil Farming
item.description: A few years ago, a Redditor asked the internet to help find a role-playing game where you kill your wife and hide her body while doing your farm chores. But was it ever real? Loey and Eleanor dig up some evidence, and sprout a few theories of their own… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Mothman
item.description: It swoops. It stalks. It’s maybe just a giant bird… but it could also be an alien? Loey and Eleanor discuss the legendary cryptid that was first sighted in Point Pleasant, West Virginia in the ‘60s: the Mothman. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Demon House
item.description: In 2014, Zak Bagans set out to investigate the claims of the Ammons family by BUYING THEIR DEMON-INFESTED HOUSE. Loey and Eleanor set up camp in the center of the story, unearthing evidence, considering theories, and questioning everything.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Alexa Nightmares
item.description: The virtual assistant developed by Amazon is supposed to make life easier, but doesn’t it also seem kind of… sinister? Loey and Eleanor sound off the creepiest instances of Alexa listening, laughing, and chiming in — unprovoked. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Lake Michigan Triangle
item.description: Pump up your floaties and grab your snorkel mask! Loey and Eleanor are deep-diving into a Great Lake that rivals the Bermuda Triangle for its vanishing ships, bizarre rock formations, and untraceable lights… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Sinister Skulls
item.description: Into the crypt we go… Loey and Eleanor dive in head first to dig up spine-chilling skulls that went viral. Because sure, we all have skulls… But not like these. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Etsy’s Haunted Store
item.description: Loey and Eleanor sift through an Etsy shop that’s sourcing its items from a haunted mansion in Ohio. The Sedamsville Rectory may have scared away the Midwest Preservation Society, but it's gaining customers online… and they might be in for more than they bargained for. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: UFOs: Close Encounters
item.description: Beam! Us! Up! Loey and Eleanor get extraterrestrial as they probe a recent UFO sighting, videos released by the Pentagon, and news of a report dropping this summer that may finally spill the tea on real-life aliens.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: MalO
item.description: A free mobile app promises companionship, but delivers a creature that gets too close for comfort. Loey and Eleanor dive into the files of the SCP Foundation to unearth the story of MalO and a curse that rings eternal… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Horror Tok: The Haunting of Harry McClarry
item.description: A paranormal saga is unfolding on TikTok, complete with heart-pounding disturbances and a very panicked dog. Loey and Eleanor deconstruct the videos to decide if it’s all real, or just really convincing…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Momo Challenge
item.description: Protect the children! Momo was a horrible mother-bird figure that allegedly coerced kids into doing unsettling, even tragic, things. Loey and Eleanor trace the hysteria from Momo’s folktale origins, to its spread through WhatsApp and YouTube, to the IRL cases it might have caused. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Blank Room Soup
item.description: A crying man eats soup while two masked figures comfort him, sparking online theories of (wait for it…) cannibalism and torture. What does it mean, and who’s really behind it? Loey and Eleanor dig into the backstory of the unsettling video and come to their own haunting conclusions. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Horror Tok: Escaping A Cross-Country Stalker
item.description: After a young couple moves into their new home in the woods, things turn ominous. Loey and Eleanor dive into the TikToks of Tyson Chandler, who’s been documenting the trespasses of a bizarre stalker who might be a member of a cult…  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: No One Dies At Disney
item.description: Is it rumor, coincidence, or straight-up policy that no one ever dies at Disney? Loey and Eleanor dig into what the Mouse doesn’t want you to know, and the lengths Disney has gone to ensure the only ghosts you’ll find there are fictional… Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Horror Tok: Who’s Been Pacing in the Woods?
item.description: TikTok user BettsnAngel69 films a shadowy figure pacing in the woods outside her home. Then she disappears from the internet. Loey and Eleanor investigate: Is it real? Is it sus? And what happened to BettsnAngel69? Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: The Watcher House
item.description: In 2014, a family in New Jersey started getting creepy, threatening letters signed by “The Watcher.” Loey and Eleanor follow the breadcrumbs of the whole terrifying saga, including the VERY dark history of the neighborhood and the case’s unsettling conclusion. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Welcome to Internet Urban Legends
item.description: It all starts April 13th… Loey Lane and Snitchery take turns being scared and skeptical as they investigate chilling stories found online. Get a sneak peek here, then follow Internet Urban Legends for new episodes every Tuesday. Listen free, only on Spotify!  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
